ygData.msgSnippet: however even yan and alloran agree with me that the shields were made useless you cant go about saying the generator is shorted out OOC and then having them go

however even yan and alloran agree with me that the shields were made useless 
you cant go about saying the generator is shorted out OOC and then having 
them go up. That is cheating and completely unfair to other players. If you 
did that then all players can do that. you made it basically known OOC that 
the trainer base was on the brink of being labeled as useless. Making a ship 
go back to being fully functional after labeling it useless is unfair to all 
players and emans that every other ship can do that. Hey I crashed the 
violator and using your logic by now I could have it lift off again have it 
warp back to the trainer base and have it attack over and over.

--part1_93.bf4ab9c.285e09b3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
